frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-brightness-panel-menu-indicator
frozen.shortDescription: If a backlight device is available, this extension shows a brightness indicator on panel menu, that allows changing brightness through scrolling on it. Useful, when using ddcci-driver-linux on a desktop PC without native keyboard buttons to change brightness.
frozen.longDescription: If a backlight device is available, this extension shows a brightness indicator on panel menu, that allows changing brightness through scrolling on it. Useful, when using ddcci-driver-linux on a desktop PC without native keyboard buttons to change brightness.
